org.janusproject.acl

Class ACLAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.janusproject.kernel.crio.core.RolePlayer
      • org.janusproject.kernel.agent.Agent
        • org.janusproject.acl.ACLAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.janusproject.kernel.agent.Holon, org.janusproject.kernel.crio.capacity.CapacityCaller, org.janusproject.kernel.logger.LoggerProvider, org.janusproject.kernel.schedule.Activable

    public class ACLAgent
extends org.janusproject.kernel.agent.Agent
    Implements the agent concept of the Janus Metamodel with the ability to manage ACL Messages.
    Version:
    $FullVersion$
    Author:
    $Author: madeline$, $Author: kleroy$, $Author: ptalagrand$, $Author: ngaud$
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • sendACLMessage

        public final org.janusproject.kernel.address.AgentAddress sendACLMessage(ACLMessage message,
                                                          org.janusproject.kernel.address.AgentAddress... agents)
        Sends the specified ACL Message to one randomly selected agent.

        This function force the emitter of the message to be this agent.

        Parameters:
        message - is the ACL Message to send
        agents - is the collection of receivers.
        Returns:
        the address of the receiver of the freshly sent message if it was found, or null otherwise.

      • getACLMessage

        public final ACLMessage getACLMessage(EnumFipaProtocol protocolType,
                       Performative performative)
        Replies the first available ACL Message in the agent mail box with the given performative and the given protocol type and, then, removes it from the mailbox.
        Parameters:
        protocolType -
        performative -
        Returns:
        the first available ACL Message, or null if the mailbox is empty.
        See Also:
        peekACLMessage(), getACLMessages(), peekACLMessages(), hasACLMessage()

      • getACLMessageForConversationId

        public final ACLMessage getACLMessageForConversationId(java.util.UUID conversationId)
        Replies the first available ACL Message for a specific conversation and, then, removes it from the mailbox.

        This method is essentially used in protocols.

        Parameters:
        conversationId -
        Returns:
        the first available ACL Message, or null
